sentences: Mark John Phythian (born 26 April 1985) is an English cricketer.
He was born in Peterborough, Cambridgeshire and educated at Oundle School.
While studying for his degree at Durham University, Phythian made his first-class debut for Durham UCCE against Somerset in 2005.
He made six further first-class appearances for the university, the last of which came against Lancashire in 2007.
His highest score of 62, which was his only first-class fifty, came against Nottinghamshire in 2006.
